title: La Luna
subtitle: The Moon
meta_desc: Learn about the moon in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, la luna Spanish, moon Spanish kids

pages.title: La Luna
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a beautiful full moon in a starry night sky over a quiet village.

pages.title: La luna es redonda.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a big round moon glowing softly in a dark blue sky.

pages.title: La luna es blanca.

pages.title: Los animales ven la luna.
